long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The GoTop Extension is a simple yet powerful browser add-on designed to enhance your web browsing experience. Once installed, this extension provides you with a convenient and unobtrusive button that appears in the bottom-right corner of your browser window whenever you scroll down a webpage.

Key Features:

1.Universal Compatibility: The extension works on all web pages, ensuring you can quickly jump back to the top of any site with just one click.
2.Auto-Appearance: The button automatically appears when you scroll down a page, so it's there when you need it without cluttering your view when you don't.
3.One-Click Action: With a single click on the button, you are instantly taken back to the top of the webpage, no matter how far down you've scrolled.
4.Minimalist Design: The button features a sleek and minimalist design that blends seamlessly with any website, maintaining the aesthetic of your browsing experience.
5.Privacy-Friendly: We value your privacy. The Scroll to Top Button Extension does not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal data. It's designed to respect your privacy and keep your browsing habits confidential.
